files.patch:
@@ -268,1 +268,1 @@
-      WARNINGS_ENABLE_ALL="-Wall -Wextra -Wformat=2 $WARNINGS_ENABLE_ADDITIONAL"
+      WARNINGS_ENABLE_ALL="-Wall -Wextra -Wpedantic -Wformat=2 $WARNINGS_ENABLE_ADDITIONAL"
@@ -270,1 +270,1 @@
-      DISABLED_WARNINGS="unknown-warning-option unused-parameter unused"
+      DISABLED_WARNINGS="unknown-warning-option unused-parameter unused extra-semi format-pedantic strict-prototypes"

@@ -92,1 +92,2 @@
-    missing-braces delete-non-abstract-non-virtual-dtor unknown-pragmas
+    missing-braces delete-non-abstract-non-virtual-dtor unknown-pragmas \
+    gnu-zero-variadic-macro-arguments
@@ -175,0 +176,1 @@
+    DISABLED_WARNINGS_clang_c2_MacroAssembler_aarch64.cpp := c++17-extensions, \
@@ -179,0 +181,1 @@

@@ -181,0 +184,1 @@

-        DISABLED_WARNINGS_clang_gtk2_interface.c := parentheses, \
-        DISABLED_WARNINGS_clang_gtk3_interface.c := parentheses, \
+        DISABLED_WARNINGS_clang_awt_Taskbar.c := parentheses pedantic, \
+        DISABLED_WARNINGS_clang_gtk2_interface.c := parentheses pedantic, \
+        DISABLED_WARNINGS_clang_gtk3_interface.c := parentheses pedantic, \

@@ -324,0 +326,1 @@

@@ -511,1 +515,1 @@
